prop.name: deliveryMethod
prop.desc: A sub property of instrument. The method of delivery.

prop.name: sender
prop.desc: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the sending end of the action.

TransferAction.name: toLocation
TransferAction.desc: A sub property of location. The final location of the object or the agent after the action.

TransferAction.name: fromLocation
TransferAction.desc: A sub property of location. The original location of the object or the agent before the action.
